about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Leaders in energy and infrastructure
about.history_text: With over 20 years of experience, we have become one of the market leaders in energy engineering and space management. Starting as a small team of passionate engineers, we have grown steadily, providing innovative and reliable solutions to our clients.
about.mission_text: We provide complete energy engineering solutions and premium rental spaces, contributing to the sustainable development of businesses in Moldova. We focus on excellence, innovation, and customer satisfaction.
about.team_text: Our team consists of experienced engineers, architects, project managers, and property management specialists, all dedicated to providing the highest quality services.

footer.about_text: Complete energy engineering solutions and premium rental spaces.
